Description.Text: Within the colorful tempo of New York City's Upper West Side, the Hotel Beacon welcomes visitors to this unique neighborhood. The newly renovated 25 story hotel is within tree-lined streets and landmark buildings. You can experience the American Museum of Natural History, Lincoln Center, Central Park and the new Rose Center for Earth and Space. The Hotel Beacon is a hotel with a different point of view that is relaxed, amiable, with handsomely decorated, oversize guest rooms and suites, each featuring a fully equipped kitchenette.

• Lincoln Center -- 10 blocks • American Museum of Natural History -- 6 blocks • Beacon Theatre -- 1/2 block • Central Park -- 3 blocks • Zabar's -- 5 blocks • Theater District -- 1 mile • Promenade Theater -- 1 block • Jacob Javits Convention Center -- 1 3/4 mile • Columbia University -- 1 3/4 mile • Julliard School -- 9 blocks • Manhattan School of Music -- 2 miles • Fordham University -- 3/4 mile • ABC World Headquarters -- 8 blocks • Filene's Basement -- 4 blocks

Over 200 spacious guestrooms and suites, all with marble bathrooms, fully-equipped kitchenette, including microwave, coffeemaker, complimentary coffee and tea. • A standard room includes either two double beds or one king bed, a marble bathroom and a fully-equipped kitchenette with microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator, tea kettle and complimentary coffee and tea. • A one-bedroom suite includes a bedroom with either two double beds or one king bed, a living room with a pull out sofa bed, a marble bathroom and a fully-equipped kitchenette including a microwave, stove, full-size refrigerator, coffee maker, tea kettle and complimentary tea. (Maximum 4 adults) • A two-bedroom suite has two double beds in each bedroom, a living room with a pull-out sofa bed, two marble bathrooms and a fully equipped kitchenette. (Maximum 6 adults)

The Newly Renovated 25 Story Hotel Is Within Tree-lined Streets And Landmark Buildings.The hotel offers 200 bedrooms handsomely decorated, each featuring a fully equipped kitchenette.The Hotel Beacon Offers The Meeting Facilities For Up To 75 Persons. The hotel boasts wonderful views of Central Park, the Hudson River and the skyscrapers of midtown Manhattan. The Hotel Beacon, the vantage point from which to venture anywhere in New York, is a hotel you'll want to come home to. Hotel Beacon is located in one of New York's most desirable neighborhoods: the Upper West Side. Overlooking Broadway and the Hudson River to the west, with Central Park to the east, or the bright lights of midtown to the south, each room affords a different Manhattan view.
• Check-in time is 3 PM • Check-out time is Noon

• From Laguardia Airport:- From Laguardia Airport-lga-take Grand Centralparkway East And Follow Signs To Midtown Tunneland Take The Midtown Tunnel And Exit At 37th Streetand Follow 37th Across Town To 8th Ave And Thenmake A Right Turn On 8th Ave And Follow To 59th Streetand It Turns Into Broadway. Take Broadway To75th Street.
